info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 4:27PM MDT until July 02 at 5:00PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pocatello has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Blaine County in central Idaho... South central Butte County in southeastern Idaho... Northwestern Power County in southeastern Idaho... West central Bonneville County in southeastern Idaho... West central Bingham County in southeastern Idaho... * Until 500 PM MDT. * At 427 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Rose to 21 miles northwest of Aberdeen, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blackfoot, Springfield, Rockford, Moreland, Rose, Fort Hall Eagle Lodge, Pingree, Taber and Groveland. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Pocatello.
